short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Passwordstate for Chrome is a form filler extension that obtains credentials from Passwordstate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Passwordstate for Chrome is a free form filler extension that obtains credentials from your on-premise Passwordstate installation.

Passwordstate is a web based solution for Enterprise Password Management, where teams of people can access and share sensitive password resources. Role based administration and end-to-end event auditing, provides a secure platform for password storage and collaboration. 

Our Chrome extension allows you to save new web site login credentials, and automatically retrieve and form-fill web site logins. In addition, Passwordstate provides these other key features:

* Reset passwords just about everywhere
* Remote sessions without passwords
* Mobile app support 
* Role-based access controls
* Two-factor authentication options
* Application Programming Interface (API)
* Auditing and compliance reporting
* Active Directory integration
* Discover Admin Accounts & Resources
* Enterprise scalability

256bit AES data encryption, code obfuscation and enterprise scalability makes it the Enterprise Password Manager of choice.

Passwordstate  can be downloaded from our web site at https://www.clickstudios.com.au
